explanation:
STEP1: "a" occurs in "ab"
applying transition 1 ("a"->"cdca") gives "cdcab"
STEP2: "a" occurs in "cdcab"
applying transition 1 ("a"->"cdca") gives "cdccdcab"

applying transition 1 ("a"->"cdca") gives "cdccdccdcab"
STEP4: "cdccdccdcab" occurs in "cdccdccdcab"
